title: Hour 2: Chief Concern?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Bart Scott debate if there's more to Baker Mayfield's comments about facing the Browns or if it's being blown out of proportion. With Russell Wilson agreeing to a new deal with Denver, we decide where he ranks among QBs in the AFC West. Plus, will Mahomes and the Chiefs reach the Super Bowl or fall short of the playoffs this season? Stephen A. and Bart are once again at odds... Desmond Howard joins the show with his picks for the College Football Playoffs. The crew reacts to Gilbert Arenas' criticism of Giannis Antetokounmpo's game play.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Will the Chiefs be Super Bowl bound or fall short of the playoffs?
